docs.summary:
A [RichTextBox](https://support.wix.com/article/content-manager-adding-and-setting-up-a-text-input) 
is an input element for entering information in rich text format.

params.name: eventHandler
params.doc:
The name of the function or
 the function expression to run when the input element receives
 input.

ret.doc: The element on which the event is now registered.

docs.summary: **This standard element function is not supported for RichTextBox.**
description: Adds an event handler that runs when the input element receives input.
A text input receives an `input` event when a user changes its input value.
You can retrieve the input element's new value by getting the `value` from the
`target` property of the [`Event`]($w.Event.html) passed to the handler you set
